pages.title: Leveling Vault Gear
pages.text: To Level up $(#033dfc)Vault Gear$() and add new modifiers to the Gear piece, you can either Complete a Vault while you are wearing/holding the Gear piece, or instantly level it up by using $(#033dfc)Wutax Crystals$()

$(#033dfc)Wutax Shards$() are required for crafting Wutax Crystals, however those may also be found inside the Vaults. Wutax Shards can be used to lower the $(#033dfc)Level Requirement$() of a Vault Gear piece. Wutax Shards can be found inside the Vaults, Completion Crates or purchased from Trading Vendors.
